message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product, which I believe will be a valuable asset to your business.  My asking price is $1,750,000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the product's value and market conditions. Let me know what you think.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,600,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market conditions and the product's value. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. While I appreciate your offer, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my original asking price.  I'm willing to come down to $1,650,000. This is a significant compromise on my part, and I believe it reflects the value of this product for your business.  I'm confident this price will be mutually beneficial.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I still think $1,580,000 is a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to be comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1,580,000, but I'm not willing to go any higher.
